newsArray.title: BAN vs NED Dream11 Prediction: Best fantasy picks for Bangladesh vs Netherlands T20 World Cup 2024
newsArray.description: Bangladesh will be gutted with the result the other day in New York as they almost upset South Africa's applecart but it wasn't to be but still the Tigers have the destiny in their own hands in the ongoing ICC Men's T20 World Cup. Bangladesh take on the Netherlands in a virtual knockout in Group D on Thursday, June 13 in and would aim to take one step closer to a place in the Super 8. Bangladesh began the tournament with a crucial win against Sri Lanka and even though they lost to the Proteas, they will fancy their chances against the Dutch and Nepal.

newsArray.title: 'Diwali Ya Holi, Anushka Loves Kohli': Indian Fans' Hilarious Chant For India Star During USA vs IND T20 World Cup Match Goes Viral- WATCH
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Virat Kohli is one of the greatest batters in modern day cricket. The right-handed batter enjoys a tremendous fan following not only in India but around the world and it wasn't an unusual sight to see fans cheering for him from the stands at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium during the USA vs India T20 World Cup 2024 match in New York.While there have been several chants which have become popular, a lesser-heard chant from the crowd is now doing the rounds on social media which involves both Kohli and his wife Bollywood actress Anushka Sharma. The incident happened during India's fielding effort after they won the toss and elected to bowl first."Diwali ya Holi, Anushka loves Kohli," echoed a chant which was captured in a video that has now gone viral.READ HERE | IND vs AUS T20 World Cup Super 8 Match CONFIRMED: Check Date, Venue, TimeTake a look at the viral video here: Fans Chanting "10 rupay ki Pepsi, Kohli bhai sexyy" and "Diwali yha Holi, Anushka loves Kohli" üòÑüëå pic.twitter.com/P0yECHeuRZ‚Äî Johns. (@CricCrazyJohns) June 13, 2024Virat Kohli Out For Golden Duck Vs USAKohli may have done his part on the field, saving runs for his team but he failed to make in impact with the bat. The right-handed batter got out for a golden duck for the first time in World Cup cricket, falling to Saurabh Netravalkar in the first over of the innings.ALSO READ | IND vs AUS T20 World Cup Super 8 Match CONFIRMED: Check Date, Venue, TimeWhile Kohli had stormed into the tournament on the back of a great form in IPL cricket, winning the orange cap in the 2024 season, he has failed to set the competition on fire so far as scores of 1, 4 and 0 in 3 innings will suggest. India would hope Kohli hits top form as India head into the Super 8 stage of the competition.
